locations.name: Bahen Center Lobby
locations.brief_description: You are in the Bahen Center ground floor lobby.
locations.long_description: You're standing on the ground floor of Bahen Center. Students pass by hurriedly, and there's an elevator to the north. You spot a campus map on the wall and some scattered handouts on a nearby table.

locations.name: Robarts Library Entrance
locations.brief_description: You stand outside the massive concrete library.
locations.long_description: The imposing Robarts Library towers above you. The main entrance is to the north, while a path leads south back to Bahen.

locations.name: Sidney Smith Hall
locations.long_description: Students debate philosophy and math at cafe tables. Exits lead west to Bahen and down to the food court.

locations.name: Sandford Fleming Building
locations.long_description: Purple-coveralled engineers rush between labs. A staircase leads up to lecture halls.

locations.name: Robarts 3rd Floor
locations.long_description: Rows of desks with students cramming for exams. A special collections room lies to the east.

locations.name: Food Court
locations.long_description: Smells of coffee and fried food. Exit leads up to Sidney Smith.

locations.name: Engineering Lab
locations.long_description: Buzzing with 3D printers and robot prototypes. Exit leads down to Fleming.

locations.name: Robarts Rare Books
locations.long_description: Climate-controlled archive with rare manuscripts. Requires special access.

locations.name: Dorm
locations.brief_description: The warm dorm you live at UofT.
locations.long_description: Your computer and all your personal belongings are all at your warm dorm,Come back to submit your exercise after finding all the items!
